3.2.1.0.message: **OPA**: This plugin can now handle custom messages from the OPA server.

3.1.0.0.message: **OPA**: Added the `include_uri_captures_in_opa_input` field. When this field is set to true, the [regex capture groups](https://docs.konghq.com/gateway/latest/reference/proxy/#using-regex-in-paths) captured on the Kong Gateway routeâ€™s path field in the current request (if any) are included as input to OPA.
**OPA**: Removed redundant deprecated code from the plugin.

3.0.0.0.message: **OPA**: New configuration parameter `include_body_in_opa_input`: When enabled, include the raw body as a string in the OPA input at `input.request.http.body` and the body size at `input.request.http.body_size`.

**OPA**: New configuration parameter `include_parsed_json_body_in_opa_input`: When enabled and content-type is `application/json`, the parsed JSON will be added to the OPA input at `input.request.http.parsed_body`.
